meanings.sent1: The unwashed dishes piled up in the sink.
meanings.sent2: The unwashed clothes had a musty smell.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his car was so unwashed, it could blend in with the mud.
meanings.sent4: The unwashed windows obscured the view of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The unwashed hands left dirt marks on the clean paper.

meanings.sent1: The unwashed crowd cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent2: Her unwashed manners at the dinner table shocked the guests.
meanings.sent3: The unwashed jokes at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His unwashed language in the meeting was inappropriate.
meanings.sent5: The unwashed behavior of the children disrupted the event.
